Good morning, Oilers!

If you have not already done so, please check your email for a letter from me! Although our buildings are now closed for the remainder of the year, school is not over! MPPS teachers and administrators are working together to develop a plan for our students. This plan will include continued learning for every student.

In the coming weeks, we will share our plan for how we will meet the academic, social and emotional needs of all students.

Once the "Stay Home, Stay Safe" order has been lifted, we will also have a plan for families to pick up personal items (locker and desk supplies, instruments, etc.).

Thank you for your patience as we put our plans together!

Stay strong and healthy, Oilers!
-Mrs. Verleger
